description.full: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 1-8, HD (High Definition). Defend the Galactica, or play as the ruthless Cylons. Pilot iconic ships from the Viper II to the Heavy Raider and lead your squadron in enormous fast-action multiplayer space combats. Unlock the full game now and join the fleet! There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/Live/accounts.
description.short: Enter the Battlestar Galactica universe.  Sign up to defend the Galactica, or play as the ruthless Cylons as they seek to remove the Human Race from existence.  Pilot iconic ships from the Viper II to the Heavy Raider and lead your squadron in enormous fast-action multiplayer space combats - up to 8 players online - or play through the single-player campaign.
